channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MapPress Maps for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MapPress Maps for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-0421|2024-08-30T12:53:51.264Z -- unknown -- mappress%20maps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MapPress Maps for WordPress plugin before 2.88.16 is affected by an IDOR as it does not ensure that posts to be retrieve via an AJAX action is a public map, allowing unauthenticated users to read arbitrary private and draft posts.
